sect2.para: Converts a floating point (real) value to a 16-bit short integer.

sect3.para: Specifies the vector length for vector processing. Typical applications will use the default value of 1.

Sets the scale factor for the conversion. For example: to normalize a sine wave with amplitude of 1.0 to the full range of short integer, use a scale factor of 32768. Values outside the range [-32768, 32767] will saturate rather than wrap around.
